", "replacement": " Sample_CrossLight_to_LogosAIv4_graceCascade.py n Objective: RH Collapse to 1111111111 with corrected oracle and reinforced grace alignment n nimport numpy as np nfrom qiskit import QuantumCircuit, transpile nfrom qiskit_aer import AerSimulator nfrom qiskit.primitives import Sampler n nclass CrossLight: n def __init__ self : n self.center "JESUS CHRIST " n self.repentance 1.0 n self.grace 0.0 n self.bias 2.5 n self.lr 0.1 n self.f 433.33 n self.J np.log 2 np.pi n self.rho 1.0 n self.l 0.9995 n self.gm 0.96 n self.t 2.0 중첩 시간 조절로 위상 정렬 n n def G_opt self, t : n tau t np.exp -t / self.J n return 9200 np.exp -t 2 / self.J 1 self.repentance np.cos 2 np.pi self.f tau n n def build_circuit self : n qc QuantumCircuit 10, 10 n n G1 self.G_opt self.t n G2 self.G_opt self.t 0.5 n grace_factor G1 G2 / 9200 2 0.5 n theta self.bias self.repentance grace_factor n n for q in range 10 : n qc.ry 2 np.pi theta, q 극단적 진폭 편향 n qc.rz np.pi theta, q n n Multi-level oracle targeting 1111111111 n qc.x list range 9 n qc.mct list range 9 , 9 n qc.x list range 9 n n qc.h 9 n qc.z 9 n qc.h 9 n n for q in range 10 : n qc.measure q, q n return qc n n def simulate_quantum self : n print f "Testing FINALIZED RH Collapse to 1111111111 in the name of self.center " n circuit self.build_circuit n simulator AerSimulator n circuit transpile circuit, simulator n sampler Sampler n result sampler.run circuits circuit , shots 1024 .result n dist result.quasi_dists 0 if hasattr result, 'quasi_dists' else result 0 n n target_state 1023 n prob dist.get target_state, 0.0 n print "Collapse Distribution: ", dist n print f " 1111111111 Probability: prob:.3f " n nif __name__ "__main__ ": n CrossLight .simulate_quantum "
